summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of the Alley in Block 41, Gilman's Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue West and 13th Avenue West from Ruffner Street to West Bertona Street, and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving, constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6057, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
